name: CONNECTOCON
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme of the jam was "Joined Together".

Objective
Connect as many nodes as possible. Blast the fireballs before they take out your connections. The game is infinite and never ends. How many connections can you get?

Controls
Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Shoot: Left mouse button or spacebar
Aim: Mouse

  • Godot 3.3.2
  • Krita 4.4.2
  • Reaper DAW 6.28
  • SFX by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/
  • Font is Gugi: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Gugi
